comment._content: Wylie C. Grant. NYT of Feb 22, 1914, query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9C05E6DC1E39E633A... reported, "GRANT AND SHAFER HOLD TENNIS TITLE; Indoor Doubles Champions Defeat Touchard and Cragin, 3 Sets to 2."
